column1: Table 2: Growth in the number of prisoners under State jurisdiction, by size of State prison population in 2000-2005 and 2005-2006
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Table 2. Growth in the number of prisoners under State jurisdiction, by size of State prison population in 2000-2005 and 2005-2006
Note: See appendix table 1 for the States in each group.
a/Excludes prisoners for the District of Columbia in 2000.  After 2001, sentenced felons from the D.C. were under Federal jurisdictions.
